name: Jasper
tagline: AI copilot for enterprise marketing teams
description: Jasper is an AI copilot for marketing teams that helps create content at scale. With advanced AI capabilities, Jasper enables teams to maintain brand voice consistency while generating high-quality marketing copy, social media posts, and long-form content.

name: Copy.ai
tagline: AI-powered content creation platform
description: Copy.ai is an AI-powered platform that helps marketers and businesses create compelling copy in seconds. From blog posts to email campaigns, Copy.ai streamlines the content creation process.

name: Pencil
tagline: AI-powered creative generation for ads
description: Pencil uses AI to generate winning ad creative at scale. The platform analyzes performance data to predict which creative concepts will perform best, helping marketers optimize their ad spend.

name: Smartly.io
tagline: Creative automation for social advertising
description: Smartly.io combines creative automation with intelligent media buying to help brands scale their social advertising. The platform enables teams to produce thousands of ad variations while optimizing performance in real-time.

name: AppsFlyer
tagline: Mobile attribution and marketing analytics
description: AppsFlyer is the leading mobile attribution and marketing analytics platform. It helps marketers measure and optimize their mobile campaigns across channels, providing accurate attribution data and deep linking capabilities.

name: Singular
tagline: Marketing intelligence platform
description: Singular provides unified marketing analytics that combines attribution, cost aggregation, and creative analytics. The platform helps marketers understand their true ROI across all channels.

name: The Trade Desk
tagline: Leading demand-side platform for programmatic
description: The Trade Desk is a leading technology company that empowers buyers of advertising through its self-service platform. It enables advertisers to create, manage, and optimize digital advertising campaigns across various channels.

name: LiveRamp
tagline: Identity resolution and data connectivity
description: LiveRamp provides identity resolution and data connectivity solutions that enable companies to connect customer data across systems and channels while maintaining privacy and compliance.

name: Segment
tagline: Customer data platform for unified data
description: Segment is a customer data platform that collects, cleans, and controls customer data. It provides a single view of the customer by connecting data from multiple sources to any tool or warehouse.

name: Branch
tagline: Mobile linking and measurement platform
description: Branch is the leading mobile linking and measurement platform, trusted by the most top ranking apps to increase efficiency and revenue through enterprise-grade links. Deep linking and attribution for mobile apps.

name: Persado
tagline: AI-generated language that motivates action
description: Persado uses AI and machine learning to generate the language that motivates each individual to engage and act. The platform optimizes marketing messages for emotion and personalization.

name: AdRoll
tagline: Growth marketing platform for D2C brands
description: AdRoll is a growth marketing platform that helps ambitious D2C brands compete and grow by using AI to find more customers. Cross-channel advertising and retargeting made simple.

name: Amplitude
tagline: Digital analytics platform for product teams
description: Amplitude is the leading digital analytics platform that helps companies understand user behavior and build better products. Real-time analytics, behavioral cohorts, and predictive insights.

name: Mixpanel
tagline: Product analytics for mobile and web
description: Mixpanel helps companies measure what matters, make decisions fast, and build better products through data. Powerful event tracking and user analytics for product teams.

name: Braze
tagline: Customer engagement platform
description: Braze is a comprehensive customer engagement platform that powers relevant and memorable experiences between consumers and brands. Push, email, in-app messaging and more in one platform.

name: Crisp
tagline: Retail data platform for CPG brands
description: Crisp connects consumer brands with real-time retail data to help them sell more and waste less. Demand signals, inventory analytics, and supply chain optimization.

name: Kochava
tagline: Unified audience platform and attribution
description: Kochava provides unified audience platform capabilities including attribution, analytics, and data management. Comprehensive mobile measurement and fraud prevention.

name: Neurons
tagline: AI-powered creative pre-testing
description: Neurons uses neuroscience and AI to predict how consumers will respond to creative before launch. Optimize ads, packaging, and digital experiences with attention prediction.

name: HYPD.ai
tagline: Your AI Assistant for Performance Marketers
description: AI assistant for performance marketers. Connect Facebook and Google Ad accounts to talk to your campaigns, create reports, and get campaign recommendations through natural language.

name: GoMarble
tagline: The AI Agent for Performance Marketing & Creative Intelligence
description: AI agent for performance marketing and creative intelligence. Generates instant HTML reports across Google, Meta, LinkedIn, and TikTok. Analyzes creative performance, surfaces insights, and provides frameworks from top 1% marketing experts. Used by 1000+ marketing teams across 80+ countries.

name: Markifact
tagline: AI Marketing Automation Platform
description: AI marketing automation platform with 10,000+ users. Features: consolidated Google & Meta Ads reports in Slides, natural language GA4 analysis in Slack, automated Google Ads audits (40+ checks), bulk Meta ads creation, SEO reports, competitor ad export, Meta ads audits (100+ checks), responsive search ads at scale, Google Merchant Center analysis, Shopify integration, GA4 setup audits (50+ checks).

name: Blobr
tagline: Run Google Ads Like a Pro
description: AI agents trained on best practices of top Google Ads experts. Plugs into Google Ads, analyzes performance continuously, and turns best practices into concrete actions. Automates 80% of daily Google Ads account management. Provides weekly prioritized recommendations tailored to goals and budget.

name: Singular MCP
tagline: MCP Server for Singular Mobile Measurement
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Singular mobile measurement platform. Enables integration with LLMs and agentic AI systems to query marketing data and trigger optimizations.

name: AppsFlyer Agentic AI Suite
tagline: AI-powered execution eliminating friction in marketing
description: AI-powered execution suite built on clean, unified, and semantically clear marketing data. Includes MCP integration for connecting any LLM to AppsFlyer data, and pre-built agents for anomaly detection, performance summaries, and opportunity spotting. Privacy-first infrastructure with partner-specific policies and regulatory standards.

name: Kochava StationOne
tagline: The Integrative AI Hub for Marketers & Digital Professionals
description: Integrative AI hub making agentic AI accessible. Orchestration layer delivering choice, security, and agentic intelligence. Runs locally on desktop or environment for complete privacy. Supports connecting any model, integrating MCPs, building custom agents. Available for Windows, macOS, and Linux.

name: Ryze AI
tagline: Let AI manage your paid ads
description: AI-powered ad management platform managing $10M+ in ad budgets for 230+ customers. Manages Meta and TikTok ads. Features: 24/7 ad monitoring, AI ad creation, real-time budget optimization, keyword and targeting management, ad audits, competitor benchmarking. Replaces agencies with AdGent AI.

name: Google Ads Advisor
tagline: Agentic conversational AI for Google Ads
description: Agentic conversational experience in Google Ads designed to maximize performance based on unique business goals. Helps identify improvement areas, troubleshoot issues, understand performance changes, generate campaign optimization suggestions, and create assets. Currently in beta, expanding to all English-language advertisers.

name: Google Analytics Advisor
tagline: Agentic AI for Google Analytics
description: Agentic conversational AI in Google Analytics powered by Gemini models. Designed to accelerate data analysis for all GA users. Provides personalized answers about analytics property with actionable insights, visualizations, and links to helpful reports. Currently available in English with plans to expand.

name: Google Ads MCP
tagline: MCP Server for Google Ads API
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Google Ads API. Enables LLMs and agentic AI to query performance data, retrieve campaign information, and access customer accounts. Open-source repository with tools for search, list accessible customers, and more.

name: Amazon Ads Agent
tagline: AI Agent for Amazon Advertising
description: AI agent launched at Amazon Ads unBoxed 2025. Simplifies campaign planning, launching, and optimization. Automates identifying targeting segments, adjusting pacing across hundreds of campaigns, and generating SQL queries. Features include campaign creation at scale, intelligent targeting recommendations, and time-to-insight acceleration.

name: Meta Business AI
tagline: AI-powered sales agent across Meta platforms
description: Always-on sales agent guiding customers from discovery to purchase across Meta ads, messaging apps, and websites. Learns from posts and campaigns to deliver personalized responses. No coding required. Handles customer conversations in Messenger, WhatsApp, Facebook Reels, and Instagram Stories. Voice interaction and return handling capabilities.

name: Meta Business Assistant
tagline: AI-powered campaign recommendations in Ads Manager
description: Personalized campaign recommendations AI in Ads Manager. Provides insights unique to Meta through seamless chat experience. Helps with campaign optimization, creative suggestions, audience insights, and performance analysis.

name: Walmart Sparky
tagline: AI Shopping Assistant
description: Walmart's AI shopping assistant available in Walmart mobile app. Helps users make purchasing decisions by reading reviews, providing product recommendations, and reducing purchase surprises. Available as in-app feature for shoppers.

name: Branch Ivy
tagline: Your strategic AI partner
description: Integrated AI system transforming how marketers work. Turns complex data into clear insights to reveal campaign performance drivers. Features include intelligent link creation with accurate tags, campaign analysis, personalized actionable recommendations, automated data analysis, and smart workflow streamlining. Privacy-safe processing with enterprise-grade security.
